headline: Closing Bell Movers: Snap falls 14% after Q1 results, no guidance
summary: In the opening 90 minutes of the evening session, U.S. equity futures are softer – Dow Industrials are flat, but S&P 500 is off by 0.2% and Nasdaq 100 is down 0.4%. In energy, WTI crude oil is extending Tuesday’s decline toward the $60 per barrel level after the largest build in API crude stocks data in four weeks. In metals, Gold is slightly lower below $3,330 per ounce. A busy afterhours earnings session saw a mixed picture in the Semiconductors and Tech space. Seagate jumped 9% on earnings be

headline: Mondelez International (NasdaqGS:MDLZ) Reports Q1 Earnings & Completes US$1.5 Billion Buyback
summary: Mondelez International (NasdaqGS:MDLZ) recently experienced a 15% price increase over the last quarter, despite mixed corporate and market news. The company's Q1 earnings report revealed a slight rise in sales but a sharp drop in net income and EPS, contrasting with market trends where earnings are forecasted to grow significantly. During the same period, the completion of a significant share buyback might have bolstered investor sentiment. However, the shareholder proposal opposing board...

headline: Hungry for More Passive Income? These Top High-Yield Dividend Stocks Can Help Satisfy Your Appetite.
summary: Mondelez has grown its dividend by at least 10% in nine of the past 10 years.  PepsiCo has delivered more than 50 years of dividend increases.  Starbucks has grown its payout at a 20% compound annual rate over the past 14 years.
